text: Ann Hardaway Sutton (born October 23, 1958) is an American equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Columbus, Georgia
title: Ann Sutton (equestrian)
